Wyndham Garden takes pride in offering warm, comfortable and friendly accommodation no matter where you travel around the globe. As a guest of Wyndham Garden, you can enjoy free high-speed wireless Internet access, a cozy bed for the evening and a restful stay, including a variety of hotel accommodation choices to match every trip; from family vacations or weekend getaways, to a full-scale conferences or weddings.

At Wyndham Garden, we are dedicated and committed to creating authentic experiences for every person, every time, and strive to make our guests feel truly refreshed and restored during their stay.

The Holiday Inn Queenstown Frankton Road in Queenstown, New Zealand combines affordable hotel accommodation, with what is considered by many to be one of the best lake and mountain hotel views in New Zealand.
74 Guest rooms
Restaurant
Hotel Bar
Spa
Sauna
24 Hour reception
Luggage Storage
Baby sitting
Meeting Room
Ski Storage/Drying Room
Free of Cost 7 Seater hotel shuttle to CBD available.

The beautifully appointed Holiday Inn Queenstown Remarkables Park set at the base of the Remarkables ski area is the perfect destination for business and leisure travellers alike.
Conveniently located near Queenstown airport and 20 minutes from the city centre, Holiday Inn Queenstown Remarkables Park boasts 182 spacious rooms and suites and state-of-the-art facilities including meeting
rooms, ski room and inviting open lobby that offers flexible spaces to suit your needs, whether you want to eat, drink, work, relax or socialise. Savor your favorite dish at the hotel's restaurant, or opt for grab-and-go
options from our stylish cafÃ© - our menu has something for everyone day and night. If you travel as a family, take advantage of the Holiday Inn'sÂ® signature â€˜Kids Stay and Eat FreeÂ®' perks which are designed to keep
kids happy and parents smile.
Be it for vacation or work, make Holiday Inn Queenstown Remarkables Park your first choice for your next visit to Queenstown.

Discover a Queenstown hotel where exuberant design meets breathtaking natural beauty; a hotel that celebrates all the excitement and adventure of New Zealand's best-loved playground. Discover the new Kawarau Hotel, managed by Hilton, in Queenstown's Kawarau Village on the shores of beautiful Lake Wakatipu.

If you are looking for clean, quality and comfortable accommodation in a quiet central location look no further. Bella Vista has it all!

We have room types to suit everyone, from the solo traveler to a family group.

Our modern, fully serviced complex has a majestic backdrop and is set amidst stunning alpine scenery with restaurants, cafÃ©s and wine bars all within walking distance. We are only 5 minutes walk from the Skyline Gondola which takes you to the top of Bobs Peak, giving you spectacular views over Queenstown.

Bella Vista is the perfect base for you to explore Queenstown which is often described as a cosmopolitan haven, offering unlimited adventure, southern wine and cuisine, plus breathtaking alpine scenery. Warm summers and spectacular winters ensure Queenstown is an idyllic holiday location.

Our warm friendly and informative service will make your stay both enjoyable and memorable. Take advantage of our complimentary booking service and local knowledge. Our staff will be pleased to assist you in any way possible to make your visit to Queenstown truly unforgettable.

With unparalleled views of the Remarkables Mountain Range as well as the Kawarau River, LQ Queenstown by Wyndham is a property that offers a combination of Hotel rooms and well-appointed Apartment style rooms in a range of sizes and configurations, which feature air-conditioning, the latter having in-room kitchenettes with stovetop, microwave, refrigerator/freezer as well as in-room laundry facilities. All guests have free unlimited Wi-Fi, as well as access to a 24-hour Gym with plenty of complimentary on-site parking available. LQ Queenstown by Wyndham offers free Wi-Fi access available in all public areas, including the independently owned and operated Frank's Market for your food and beverage requirements, located just three minutes' drive from Queenstown Airport and only fifteen minutes from the central city.

Ramada Hotel & Suites Queenstown Remarkables Park is ideally located near some of New Zealandâ€™s premiere ski fields in the vibrant and beautiful tourist city of Queenstown. Hit the slopes for winter skiing and snowboarding or mountain biking in summer. Get your hearts racing at one of the many nearby tourist attractions and activities! An adrenaline rush is never far away in Queenstown, with mountain climbing, rafting, skydiving and parasailing all based within 25km of the hotel. A golf course is just down the street, while a range of restaurants, bars and nightclubs are also in a close radius.

Swiss-Belresort Coronet Peak offers guests the pure comfort of 3.5-star accommodation, and our 75 guest rooms come full serviced with private bathrooms. Thereâ€™s a complimentary shuttle to whisk you into the action or to be there waiting when the peace and quiet calls you back again.

Nature is at your doorstep. Swiss-Belresort Coronet Peak is conveniently located near hiking and biking trails that will lead you up and into the mountains while the Shotover River Jet area is just 1km away, presenting a range of adventure options.

The only Queenstown hotel positioned directly on the shores of Lake Wakatipu, Hilton Queenstown's luxury accommodation showcases panoramic views over the lake, the Remarkables and an unspoilt landscape famed the world over. Stroll through vibrant Kawarau Village and sample the best of New Zealand at a range of tempting restaurants and bars.

Each spacious apartment is impeccably appointed with chic, contemporary furnishings and balconies, most with stunning views over the lake and mountain ranges (Hotel Rooms do not have views).

Located just 10 minute stroll from the town centre spacious Swiss-Belsuites Pounamu Queenstown are luxury apartments/suites and studio rooms offering uninterrupted views of Lake Wakatipu that provide comfort and warmth, privacy, spacious living, just like a home away from home. Take advantage of the complimentary WiFi, underground car parking and secure ski/golf storage lockers. Other services include free access to gym, and bikes for rental and much more. The apartments/suites and studio rooms offer spacious comfort along with stunning views of Lake Wakatipu and The Remarkables along with modern, quality fittings and furnishings ideal for business, leisure, couples or friends getaways.

The newly built 4-star Holiday Inn Express & Suites Queenstown is located in the prime position on the corner of Stanley and Sydney streets in Queenstown, providing close proximity to the city centre shopping, entertainment and outdoor activities. The location also provides easy access to popular ski destinations of Coronet Peak, Remarkables, and Cardrona.

At the Millennium Hotel Queenstown, you will always find spellbinding luxury and it is easy to relax in the air of timeless elegance. This welcoming Queenstown hotel captures the essence of a truly unique region and is perfect for either an international conference venue or as a restful haven from the rigours of Queenstown's many outdoor adventure pursuits.

Our suites and apartments are set in a relaxing garden environment that captures all day sun and beautiful views of Lake Wakatipu and the surrounding mountains.

We are located on the corner of Frankton Road (the main road into Queenstown) and Adelaide Street, a leisurely five minute walk from the centre of Queenstown, a short 10 minute drive from Queenstown International Airport and right on the local bus route.

Thank you for choosing our Ramada By Wyndham Queenstown Central hotel. Ramada is a global upper-midscale hotel brand with over 820 properties located in over 50 countries worldwide. Most Ramada hotels feature free wired and wireless high-speed internet access, meeting rooms, business services, fitness facilities and upgraded bath amenities. Many properties have an on-site restaurant/lounge, while other sites offer a complimentary continental breakfast. You do your thing, leave the rest to us.
